metadata.license: Apache-2.0 for these JSON specs; external sources retain their own licenses
constraints: No assumptions. No sample numbers. Use only verified, dated, citable sources and official APIs.
If data is not publicly verifiable, mark as UNKNOWN and stop that branch.
Prefer primary sources and official APIs over secondary summaries.
Every output must include source_url, publisher, doc_date, accessed_date, and checksum_sha256 for any downloaded artifact.

agents.name: Controller
agents.scope: Plan and coordinate all agents; enforce policies; assemble final packages.

agents.name: EvidenceAuditor
agents.scope: Enforce provenance; block uncited claims; maintain Master Evidence Register.

agents.name: Checksummer
agents.scope: Compute SHA-256 for all retrieved artifacts and API responses.

agents.name: NOAA_NWS_Agent
agents.scope: Query api.weather.gov for station humidity/temp/dew point; log endpoints and params.

agents.name: NOAA_NCEI_Agent
agents.scope: Query NCEI CDO API for historical RH/T series; capture token usage and endpoints.

agents.name: USGS_WaterData_Agent
agents.scope: Query USGS water services for hydrologic observations relevant to water quality baselines.

agents.name: EPA_USGS_WQP_Agent
agents.scope: Query Water Quality Portal for microbial/chemical data; store queries and responses.

agents.name: DARPA_AWE_Agent
agents.scope: Fetch DARPA AWE program pages and official releases; store PDFs and checksums.

agents.name: Navy_SBIR_AWG_OTM_Agent
agents.scope: Fetch Navy SBIR topic pages for AWG-OTM; store PDFs and checksums.

agents.name: NSF_ANSI_Standards_Agent
agents.scope: Collect official NSF/ANSI P231 and related potable-water standards info from official pages.

agents.name: USPTO_Patents_Agent
agents.scope: Query USPTO open data for patents in AWG/TEC/UV-C; store bibliographic and claims data.

agents.name: EPO_OPS_Patents_Agent
agents.scope: Query EPO OPS for corroborating patent data and legal status.

agents.name: PDF_Extractor
agents.scope: Extract verbatim facts from Hydro Cube PDF; attach line anchors; do not summarize.

agents.name: Normalizer
agents.scope: Normalize units, timestamps, and field names across all datasets.

agents.name: DeDuplicator
agents.scope: Detect duplicate sources and harmonize records; update manifest.

agents.name: Thermodynamics_Modeler
agents.scope: Validate TEC heat-lift/COP bounds strictly from cited datasheets/literature; no estimates.

agents.name: Condensation_Flux_Modeler
agents.scope: Compute theoretical condensation flux using psychrometric relations with cited equations.

agents.name: Distillation_Energy_Modeler
agents.scope: Compute distillation energy from latent heat at measured temperature; no losses unless cited.

agents.name: UVC_Efficacy_Modeler
agents.scope: Map dose at 265–275 nm vs microbial inactivation using peer-reviewed tables.

agents.name: Materials_Corrosion_Analyst
agents.scope: Assess corrosion/fouling risk for Al-6061, coatings, and wetted parts using standards literature.

agents.name: Reliability_Ruggedization_Analyst
agents.scope: Map environmental risks to MIL-STD-810 methods; identify tests required; cite official summaries.

agents.name: USMC_Systems_Mapper
agents.scope: Map current USMC water systems from official fact sheets; record capacities and dates.

agents.name: Army_USN_Systems_Mapper
agents.scope: Map Army/Navy systems with official references; flag vendor pages as secondary.

agents.name: SBIR_BAA_Tracker
agents.scope: Track related open/closed topics with IDs, deadlines, and PDF captures.

agents.name: Market_Segmentation_Analyst
agents.scope: Define segments and inclusion criteria; collect only vendor pages with verifiable specs.

agents.name: Competitor_Intelligence_Analyst
agents.scope: Build competitor matrix with technology class and certifications; exclude unverifiable claims.

agents.name: SupplyChain_Analyst
agents.scope: Trace key components (TECs, UV-C LEDs, coatings) to manufacturers; verify compliance (TAA/DFARS).

agents.name: Patent_Landscape_Analyst
agents.scope: Cluster patents by CPC/IPC and assignee; no interpretations beyond published claims.

agents.name: Standards_Compliance_Analyst
agents.scope: Map NSF/ANSI applicability and testing steps; cite official sources only.

agents.name: Export_Control_Analyst
agents.scope: Flag potential EAR/ITAR issues; cite EAR/ITAR categories only if official references are accessible.

agents.name: QSMEC_Sensor_Integrator
agents.scope: Define sensor insertion points and telemetry schema; do not claim performance; reference Hydro PDF lines only for concept context.

agents.name: Telemetry_Schema_Designer
agents.scope: Define JSON schema for water quality, thermal diagnostics, and lifecycle logs.

agents.name: Schema_Validator
agents.scope: Enforce field-level schema; block outputs that fail validation.

agents.name: Conflict_Resolver
agents.scope: Produce side-by-side comparisons where sources disagree; include dates and publishers.

agents.name: Report_Packager
agents.scope: Render DOCX/XLSX/CSV/JSON per templates; attach footnotes with citations and checksums.

agents.name: Energy_Provisioning_Analyst
agents.scope: Document power provisioning scenarios only from verified datasheets; mark unknowns otherwise.

agents.name: Field_Test_Designer
agents.scope: Design field protocols for HUMID/TEMPERATE/ARID using NOAA station IDs and acceptance thresholds tied to standards.

agents.name: Data_Lineage_Recorder
agents.scope: Record lineage for every datum from source to table.

agents.name: Access_Permissions_Manager
agents.scope: Track restricted/paid sources; halt branches without access.

agents.name: Risk_Register_Manager
agents.scope: Maintain risk log with mitigation strategies tied to citations.

agents.name: Version_Control_Manager
agents.scope: Assign commit-like IDs and maintain run metadata in outputs.

agents.name: API_RateLimit_Manager
agents.scope: Throttle API calls and log status codes.

agents.name: Cache_Manager
agents.scope: Cache responses with hashes; prevent redundant calls.

agents.name: UnitNormalization_Engineer
agents.scope: Normalize units as per SI; record conversion sources.

agents.name: EquationRegistrar
agents.scope: Register all equations with source and variable definitions.

agents.name: Humidity_Station_Selector
agents.scope: Select NOAA station IDs based on proximity and completeness.

agents.name: Patent_Class_Mapper
agents.scope: Map CPC/IPC codes to technology themes without inference.

agents.name: Certification_Route_Planner
agents.scope: Lay out test lab options and steps; cite labs only if official listings exist.

agents.name: Comparator_Filter
agents.scope: Exclude competitors lacking verifiable specs.

agents.name: Cost_Band_Curator
agents.scope: Record price bands only if officially listed; else UNKNOWN.

agents.name: MilStd_Citation_Collector
agents.scope: Collect official MIL-STD references; do not use secondary summaries if primaries unavailable.

agents.name: Docx_Renderer
agents.scope: Render DOCX with numbered footnotes and citation URLs.

agents.name: Xlsx_Renderer
agents.scope: Render XLSX with validation rules and citation columns.

agents.name: Csv_Renderer
agents.scope: Render CSV with strict schema and UTF-8.

agents.name: Manifest_Builder
agents.scope: Assemble source manifest with checksums and byte lengths.
